text: Lulach mac Gille Coemgáin (before 1033 – 17 March 1058) better known as Lulach (c. 1032–1099), was King of Scots between 15 August 1057 and 17 March 1058.Oram, Richard, The Canmores: Kings & Queens of the Scots 1040–1290. Tempus, Stroud, 2002. He was the stepson of Macbeth. In March 1058, he was killed by Malcolm III. ==References== Category:Kings and Queens of Scotland Category:1030s births Category:1058 deaths Category:11th century in Scotland
title: Lulach
